name: pm2.67-2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wo(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(wo(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wo(w0, w1))

comment: Slight generalization of Theorem *2.67 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 107. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2005.)
